title.rendered: Paarl vs Eastern Cape, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Paarl: Jason Roy, Jos Buttler (wk), Wihan Lubbe, David Miller (c), Dane Vilas, Eoin Morgan, Evan Jones, Ferisco Adams, Bjorn Fortuin, Lungi Ngidi, Tabraiz Shamsi

Eastern Cape: Adam Rossington (wk), JJ Smuts, Sarel Erwee, Aiden Markram (c), Tristan Stubbs, Jordan Cox, Marco Jansen, Roelof van der Merwe, Sisanda Magala, Brydon Carse, Ottniel Baartman

Pitch Report

Venue: Boland Park, Paarl

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 132

2nd innings average score: 155

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Also Read:

India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Tips

Fantasy Tips of the Day

In his last 3 competitive venues at Paarl, Jos Buttler’s scores read 22 off 15, 29* off 21, and 35 off 27. He has provided bonus points for 11 boundaries.

Bjorn Fortuin opened the bowling in the last two games at the venue and registered consecutive three-wicket hauls. Overall, he has taken 16 wickets with an economy of 6.2 RPO.

Aiden Markram is the only player from both teams to have starred in the Ultimate Team of all the games this season.

Marco Jansen has provided more points with the bat than the ball recently. After his unbeaten 36*, he was promoted to No.7: the results were 16* and 66.

Tabraiz Shamsi is yet to make it to the Ultimate Team in this edition. To make it worse, he has added negative points for an economy of 9.3 RPO.

In the last 3 games at the venue, spinners accounted for 42% of the wickets.

Paarl has generated more fantasy points than Eastern Cape. A combination of 7-4 or 6-5 in favour of Paarl is more likely to fetch more points for fantasy players.
